metadata.description: Inventory - REQUIRED. Environment, including geographic location, for Power Automate - Ex for commercial: https://flow.microsoft.com/manage/environments/

parameters.item/admin_flowinstanceurl: @concat(parameters('Power Automate Environment Variable (admin_PowerAutomateEnvironmentVariable)'), workflow()?['tags']['environmentName'], '/flows/', workflow()?['name'], '/runs/', workflow()?['run']['name'])

Catch_-_not_ready_to_take_last_run_date.inputs: Catch - not ready to take last run date

CATCH_-_Cannot_gather_due_to_GDS_issue.inputs: CATCH - Cannot gather due to GDS issue

CATCH_-_Cannot_gather_by_name_due_to_GDS.inputs: CATCH - Cannot gather due to GDS issue

parameters.$filter: admin_useridentityprovider eq null and admin_userid ne null and _admin_environment_value eq @{triggerOutputs()?['body/admin_environmentid']}
admin_useridentityprovider eq null and admin_userid eq '@{items('Apply_to_each_user_with_unknown_identity')}' and _admin_environment_value eq @{triggerOutputs()?['body/admin_environmentid']}
admin_useridentityprovider eq null and admin_userid eq '@{items('Apply_to_each_user_with_unknown_identity')}' and _admin_environment_value eq @{triggerOutputs()?['body/admin_environmentid']}

If_acess_mode_non-interactive,_support_u.description: User owned App Registrations already covered above with call to Azure AD

Add_User_Identity_and_Guest_User_informa.description: Will update a few fields like User Type for the newly added users

Get_Security_Roles.description: Configure what SRs to track in the Tenant Security Roles table
